Package diffusion
[transport]

Module orchestrating the diffusion scheme. The main routine in the module is diffuse(). Explicit and implicit diffusion operators are included here. More...


Functions/Subroutines

subroutine diffuse (conc, conc_prev, area, area_prev, area_lo, area_hi, area_lo_prev, area_hi_prev, disp_coef_lo, disp_coef_hi, disp_coef_lo_prev, disp_coef_hi_prev, ncell, nvar, time, theta_stm, dt, dx)
 Calculates the diffusive portion of the constituent transport. It contains an explicit version of the diffusion operator and a general (involving all potential cases) diffusion operator as well, with a coefficient theta_stm for selecting the level of implicitness. (theta_stm=0.5 is Crank Nicolson.). The matrix is solved via a tri-diagonal solver. ! The algoritm looks like this:
  • This creates the diffusive fluxes sends them for modification for boundaries and then differences the fluxes to get the operator d/dx(Ad/dx).
    • Calculate interior and boundary fluxes
  • Construct right hand side with neumann boundary condition imposed
  • Construct diffusion coefficeint matrix with neumann boundary condition imposed
  • Solve the system.

subroutine explicit_diffusion_operator (explicit_diffuse_op, conc, area_lo, area_hi, disp_coef_lo, disp_coef_hi, ncell, nvar, time, dx, dt)
 Calculate the explicit diffusion operator for a moment in time. Explicit diffusion operator construction. This creates the diffusive fluxes sends them for modification for boundaries and then differences the fluxes to get the operator d/dx(Ad/dx).
subroutine diffusive_flux (diffusive_flux_lo, diffusive_flux_hi, conc, area_lo, area_hi, disp_coef_lo, disp_coef_hi, ncell, nvar, time, dx, dt)
 Estimates the diffusive flux for a moment in time.
subroutine construct_right_hand_side (right_hand_side, explicit_diffuse_op, area_prev, area_lo_prev, area_hi_prev, disp_coef_lo_prev, disp_coef_hi_prev, conc_prev, theta, ncell, time, nvar, dx, dt)
 Construct the right hand side vector from previous step, and impose Neumann boundary condition on it.
subroutine construct_diffusion_matrix (center_diag, up_diag, down_diag, area, area_lo, area_hi, disp_coef_lo, disp_coef_hi, theta_stm, ncell, time, nvar, dx, dt)
 Construct the matrix for the diffusion solver without boundary condition modification or structure on interior of domain.
subroutine solve (center_diag, up_diag, down_diag, right_hand_side, conc, ncell, nvar)
 Solve the system of linear equations.

Detailed Description

Module orchestrating the diffusion scheme. The main routine in the module is diffuse(). Explicit and implicit diffusion operators are included here.

Function/Subroutine Documentation

subroutine diffusion.construct_diffusion_matrix ( real(stm_real),dimension(ncell,nvar),intent(out)  center_diag,
real(stm_real),dimension(ncell,nvar),intent(out)  up_diag,
real(stm_real),dimension(ncell,nvar),intent(out)  down_diag,
real(stm_real),dimension (ncell),intent(in)  area,
real(stm_real),dimension(ncell),intent(in)  area_lo,
real(stm_real),dimension(ncell),intent(in)  area_hi,
real(stm_real),dimension (ncell,nvar),intent(in)  disp_coef_lo,
real(stm_real),dimension (ncell,nvar),intent(in)  disp_coef_hi,
real(stm_real),intent(in)  theta_stm,
integer,intent(in)  ncell,
real(stm_real),intent(in)  time,
integer,intent(in)  nvar,
real(stm_real),intent(in)  dx,
real(stm_real),intent(in)  dt 
)

Construct the matrix for the diffusion solver without boundary condition modification or structure on interior of domain.

Parameters:
center_diag Values of the coefficients at the diagonal in matrix
up_diag Values of the coefficients above the diagonal in matrix
down_diag Values of the coefficients below diagonal in matrix
area Cell centered area at new time
area_lo Low side area at new time
area_hi High side area at new time
disp_coef_lo Low side constituent dispersion coef. at new time
disp_coef_hi High side constituent dispersion coef. at new time
theta_stm Explicitness coefficient; 0 is explicit, 0.5 Crank-Nicolson, 1 full implicit
ncell Number of cells
time Current time
nvar Number of variables
dx Spatial step
dt Time step

subroutine diffusion.construct_right_hand_side ( real(stm_real),dimension(ncell,nvar),intent(out)  right_hand_side,
real(stm_real),dimension (ncell,nvar),intent(in)  explicit_diffuse_op,
real(stm_real),dimension (ncell),intent(in)  area_prev,

real(stm_real),dimension (ncell,nvar),intent(in)  disp_coef_hi_prev,
real(stm_real),dimension(ncell,nvar),intent(in)  conc_prev,
real(stm_real),intent(in)  theta,
integer,intent(in)  ncell,
real(stm_real),intent(in)  time,
integer,intent(in)  nvar,
real(stm_real),intent(in)  dx,
real(stm_real),intent(in)  dt 
)

Construct the right hand side vector from previous step, and impose Neumann boundary condition on it.

Parameters:
right_hand_side The right hand side vector
explicit_diffuse_op Explicit diffusion operator
area_prev Cell centered area at old time
area_lo_prev Low side area at old time
area_hi_prev High side area at old time
disp_coef_lo_prev Low side constituent dispersion coef. at old time
disp_coef_hi_prev High side constituent dispersion coef. at old time
conc_prev Concentration at old time
theta Explicitness coefficient; 0 is explicit, 0.5 Crank-Nicolson, 1 full implicit
ncell Number of cells
time Current time
nvar Number of variables
dx Spatial step
dt Time step

subroutine diffusion.diffuse ( real(stm_real),dimension(ncell,nvar),intent(out)  conc,
real(stm_real),dimension(ncell,nvar),intent(in)  conc_prev,
real(stm_real),dimension (ncell),intent(in)  area,
real(stm_real),dimension (ncell),intent(in)  area_prev,
real(stm_real),dimension (ncell),intent(in)  area_lo,
real(stm_real),dimension (ncell),intent(in)  area_hi,
real(stm_real),dimension (ncell),intent(in)  area_lo_prev,
real(stm_real),dimension (ncell),intent(in)  area_hi_prev,
real(stm_real),dimension (ncell,nvar),intent(in)  disp_coef_lo,
real(stm_real),dimension (ncell,nvar),intent(in)  disp_coef_hi,
real(stm_real),dimension(ncell,nvar),intent(in)  disp_coef_lo_prev,
real(stm_real),dimension(ncell,nvar),intent(in)  disp_coef_hi_prev,
integer,intent(in)  ncell,
integer,intent(in)  nvar,
real(stm_real),intent(in)  time,
real(stm_real),intent(in)  theta_stm,
real(stm_real),intent(in)  dt,
real(stm_real),intent(in)  dx 
)

Calculates the diffusive portion of the constituent transport. It contains an explicit version of the diffusion operator and a general (involving all potential cases) diffusion operator as well, with a coefficient theta_stm for selecting the level of implicitness. (theta_stm=0.5 is Crank Nicolson.). The matrix is solved via a tri-diagonal solver. ! The algoritm looks like this:

  • This creates the diffusive fluxes sends them for modification for boundaries and then differences the fluxes to get the operator d/dx(Ad/dx).
    • Calculate interior and boundary fluxes
  • Construct right hand side with neumann boundary condition imposed
  • Construct diffusion coefficeint matrix with neumann boundary condition imposed
  • Solve the system.

Parameters:
conc Concentration at new time
conc_prev Concentration at old time
area Cell-centered area at new time
area_prev Cell-centered area at old time
area_lo Low side area centered in time
area_hi High side area centered in time
area_lo_prev Low side area centered at old time
area_hi_prev High side area centered at old time
disp_coef_lo Low side constituent dispersion coef. at new time
disp_coef_hi High side constituent dispersion coef. at new time
disp_coef_lo_prev Low side constituent dispersion coef. at old time
disp_coef_hi_prev High side constituent dispersion coef. at old time
ncell Number of cells
nvar Number of variables
time instantaneous time
theta_stm Explicitness coefficient; 0 is explicit, 0.5 Crank-Nicolson, 1 full implicit
dt Time step
dx Spacial step

subroutine diffusion.diffusive_flux ( real(stm_real),dimension(ncell,nvar),intent(out)  diffusive_flux_lo,
real(stm_real),dimension(ncell,nvar),intent(out)  diffusive_flux_hi,
real(stm_real),dimension(ncell,nvar),intent(in)  conc,
real(stm_real),dimension(ncell),intent(in)  area_lo,
real(stm_real),dimension(ncell),intent(in)  area_hi,
real(stm_real),dimension(ncell,nvar),intent(in)  disp_coef_lo,
real(stm_real),dimension(ncell,nvar),intent(in)  disp_coef_hi,
integer,intent(in)  ncell,
integer,intent(in)  nvar,
real(stm_real),intent(in)  time,
real(stm_real),intent(in)  dx,
real(stm_real),intent(in)  dt 
)

Estimates the diffusive flux for a moment in time.

Parameters:
diffusive_flux_lo Explicit diffusive flux low side
diffusive_flux_hi Explicit diffusive flux high side
conc Concentration at old time
area_lo Low side area at old time
area_hi High side area at old time
disp_coef_lo Low side constituent dispersion coef. at old time
disp_coef_hi High side constituent dispersion coef. at old time
ncell Number of cells
nvar Number of variables
time Current time
dx Spatial step

subroutine diffusion.explicit_diffusion_operator ( real(stm_real),dimension(ncell,nvar),intent(out)  explicit_diffuse_op,
real(stm_real),dimension(ncell,nvar),intent(in)  conc,
real(stm_real),dimension(ncell),intent(in)  area_lo,
real(stm_real),dimension(ncell),intent(in)  area_hi,
real(stm_real),dimension(ncell,nvar),intent(in)  disp_coef_lo,
real(stm_real),dimension(ncell,nvar),intent(in)  disp_coef_hi,
integer,intent(in)  ncell,
integer,intent(in)  nvar,
real(stm_real),intent(in)  time,
real(stm_real),intent(in)  dx,
real(stm_real),intent(in)  dt 
)

Calculate the explicit diffusion operator for a moment in time. Explicit diffusion operator construction. This creates the diffusive fluxes sends them for modification for boundaries and then differences the fluxes to get the operator d/dx(Ad/dx).

Parameters:
explicit_diffuse_op Explicit diffusion operator
conc Concentration at old time
area_lo Low side area at old time
area_hi High side area at old time
disp_coef_lo Low side constituent dispersion coef. at old time
disp_coef_hi High side constituent dispersion coef. at old time
ncell Number of cells
nvar Number of variables
time Current time
dx Spacial step

subroutine diffusion.solve ( real(stm_real),dimension(ncell,nvar),intent(in)  center_diag,
real(stm_real),dimension(ncell,nvar),intent(in)  up_diag,
real(stm_real),dimension(ncell,nvar),intent(in)  down_diag,
real(stm_real),dimension(ncell,nvar),intent(in)  right_hand_side,
real(stm_real),dimension(ncell,nvar),intent(out)  conc,
integer,intent(in)  ncell,
integer,intent(in)  nvar 
)

Solve the system of linear equations.

Parameters:
center_diag Values of the coefficients at the diagonal in matrix
up_diag Values of the coefficients above the diagonal in matrix
down_diag Values of the coefficients below diagonal in matrix
right_hand_side Values of the right hand side vector
conc Values of the computed solution
ncell Number of volumes
nvar Number of variables
